data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Saraburi, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saraburi, Thailand
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Saraburi.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary: On average, 71 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Saraburi, Thailand.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Saraburi, Thailand.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Saraburi, Thailand, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Thai Islam people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Thai Islam people.
Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 575,100 citizens of the the state of Saraburi.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.prayer: God, we pray both the men and women of Saraburi, Thailand will find ways to meet in groups of two or three to encourage and correct one another from your Word.
Please, convict the 3,719 believers in Saraburi, Thailand to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.
